name: OCKCompletionRingButton
desc: A selectable completion ring with an inner-check view and a title label.

items.name: func setState(OCKCompletionRingButton.CompletionState, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Changes the display state of the button.

items.name: var completionState: OCKCompletionRingButton.CompletionState { get }
items.desc: The amount of completion the ring displays.

items.name: let contentStackView: OCKStackView
items.desc: A view that organizes its children vertically, and contains the completion ring view and label.

items.name: let label: OCKLabel
items.desc: A label that displays the day component of a date.

items.name: let ring: OCKCompletionRingView
items.desc: A ring view that fills based on the adherence for the date to which it corresponds.

items.name: enum OCKCompletionRingButton.CompletionState
items.desc: A set of cases that specify the completion state.

items.name: func tintColorDidChange()
items.desc: Called when the tint color of the view changes.
